name: Dead Wire (Demo)
description:
Top-down, round-based zombie survival game. Current demo was made in 2 weeks, with no plans to slow development. Any and all feedback is appreciated.

There are currently four player skins, one map, three enemies that get progressively stronger, and six weapons each with respective upgrades. I have plans for two more maps, four more weapons, more powerful weapons available from the mystery box, and at least two more types of enemies, as well as possible multiplayer support in the future.
